title: Is the Middle Class within Reach for Middle-Income Families?
content: Note:  Wealth values are reported in 2018 dollars using personal consumption expenditures prices and indexed to 1989:Q3.      Source:  Federal Reserve Board, Distributional Financial Accounts; Bureau of Economic Analysis; calculations by Board staff.   50  100  150  200  250  1989:Q3 1992:Q3 1995:Q3 1998:Q3 2001:Q3 2004:Q3 2007:Q3 2010:Q3 2013:Q3 2016:Q3  Figure 8.  Change in average assets and liabilities  of middle-income households since 1989  Liabilities  1989:Q3 = 100  Assets  2018:Q4
